name: Snake Eggs
overview: Snake Eggs is an animated 1-player gambling game for the TRS-80. The player and the computer take turns rolling a number from 1 to 22. The goal is to get as close to 41 without going over. At the beginning of each round, the player wagers a bet, and starts with $1000. A roll of "snake eggs" wins, and a roll of "scrambled eggs" automatically loses.
